content: contact us at help@bellacococrochet com support hours monday friday 9 am 4 pm gmt response time within 48 hours **refund policy** due to the nature of digital downloads refunds or exchanges are not available please review all product details before purchase **licensing and permissions** licensing terms this pattern is for personal use only you may not redistribute resell or share this pattern in any form restrictions finished products made from this pattern may be sold but credit to granny square tote bag pattern by bella coco crochet is appreciated mass production is prohibited **updates and maintenance** includes free updates for any corrections or clarifications updates will be sent via email or can be downloaded from your account if purchased via etsy please email help@bellacococrochet com if you require updated files **legal and manufacturer contact information** bella coco crochet ltd 6 clinton avenue nottingham england ng5 1aw help@bellacococrochet com eu representative eucomply oü pärnu mnt 139b-14 11317 tallinn estonia hello@eucompliancepartner com +33757690241 privacy policy https //bellacococrochet com/policies/privacy-policy
